languages.text: Enemies that begin their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} within the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} suffer 14 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
languages.original_text: Противники, которые начинают свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушенными{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженными{/g} в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g} псайкера, получают 14 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Enemies that begin their turn stunned or immobilised within the psyker's line of sight suffer 14 damage.

Enemies that begin their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} within the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} suffer 14 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

Enemies that begin their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} within the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} suffer 14 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text: 敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，如果该名敌人在灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内，而且遭到了{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}，则该名敌人受到14点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。

traits.locale_text: 敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，如果该名敌人在灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线范围{/g}内，而且遭到了{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}，则该名敌人受到14点伤害。
